The original 1913 edition of this book, and a copy I have here of the
Tuttl=
e 1963 reprint, both have a fold out "Synoptical Table of the
Nengo" betwee=
n the two books, i.e. between page 179 (the end of "The
Sword Book ...) and=
 page 3 (the beginning of "Book of Same).

I'm looking at a copy of "The Sw=
ord and the Same,"  the Holland Press
reprint (1979 printing) and it does n=
ot have this chart, not torn or
cut out, just not there. I'm hesitant to co=
nclude that none of the
Holland reprints have the chart, so if anyone who h=
as a copy of this
book could check for the fold out Nengo chart and let me =
know what you
find, my bibliographic curiosity will be satisfied. Holland r=
eprinted
it several times starting in 1963, so tell me which printing you h=
ave,
and if there is or is not a Nengo chart. If you happen to have a copy
=
of the Tuttle reprint other than the 1963 - I'm not sure they printed
it mo=
re than once - and let me know the same information, I'd
appreciate it.

Pl=
ease mail me directly at bridgeofdreams@..., no need to reply
to the =
list(s). I'll summarize the information for all.

Thanks,

Craig
